price: Reci: “Šta mislite, ako vode vaše ponornice postanu, ko će vam vodu na površinu izvesti?”
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَصۡبَحَ مَآؤُكُمۡ غَوۡرٗا فَمَن يَأۡتِيكُم بِمَآءٖ مَّعِينِۭ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in aṣbaḥa māukum ghawran faman yatīkum bimāin maʿīnin
